tool_description: Validates survey questions for completeness, consistency, best practices, and compliance with engagement survey standards.

question_ids.description: Array of question IDs to validate

validation_level.description: Validation strictness: basic, standard, or comprehensive

check_bias.description: Check for potential bias in question wording

survey_length_target.description: Target survey completion time in minutes for length validation

error_messages: Invalid validation level: Must be one of [basic, standard, comprehensive]
Question not found: One or more question_ids do not exist
Empty question list: question_ids array cannot be empty
Too many questions: Maximum 100 questions can be validated in one operation
Invalid time target: survey_length_target must be between 5 and 60 minutes
usage: Provide question_ids array and optionally set validation_level, check_accessibility, check_bias, and survey_length_target. Returns comprehensive validation results with recommendations for improvement.

passed_questions.description: Number of questions that passed validation

failed_questions.description: Number of questions that failed validation

errors.description: List of validation errors requiring fixes

estimated_completion_time.description: Estimated total survey completion time in minutes
